attributes.action: Stop the re-sale of concert & show tickets on profit making internet sites
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I feel that we the general public are constantly ripped off, by internet sites selling tickets at several times the face value. this situation needs to stop, new laws should be established to prevent the re-sale of tickets for excessive profit. Tickets on a popular auction site are going for 4x & more their face value. People are not happy to pay this but find it impossible to obtain tickets, also the amount of tickets some of these sellers are selling appear to be excessive

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
